verses.text: The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, which \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amoz|strong="H0531"\w* did \w see|strong="H2372"\w*.

Lift ye \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w banner|strong="H5251"\w* upon the \w high|strong="H8192"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* unto them, \w shake|strong="H5130"\w* the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that they may \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w gates|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w nobles|strong="H5081"\w*.

I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* my sanctified \w ones|strong="H6942"\w*, I have also \w called|strong="H7121"\w* my mighty \w ones|strong="H1368"\w* for mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, \add even\add* them that \w rejoice|strong="H5947"\w* in my \w highness|strong="H1346"\w*.

The \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, like \w as|strong="H1823"\w* of a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; a \w tumultuous|strong="H7588"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w mustereth|strong="H6485"\w* the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 13.4 \ft like…: Heb. the likeness of\f*

They \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from a \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, from the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \add even\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of his \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H2254"\w* the whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ \w Howl|strong="H3213"\w* ye; for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* at \w hand|strong="H7138"\w*; it shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* as a \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w* from the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*.

Therefore shall all \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* be \w faint|strong="H7503"\w*, and every \w man’s|strong="H0582"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* shall \w melt|strong="H4549"\w*:\f + \fr 13.7 \ft be faint: or, fall down\f*

And they shall be \w afraid|strong="H0926"\w*: \w pangs|strong="H6735"\w* and \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* shall take \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* of them; they shall be in \w pain|strong="H2342"\w* as a woman that \w travaileth|strong="H3205"\w*: they shall be \w amazed|strong="H8539"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* at \w another|strong="H7453"\w*; their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \add shall be as\add* \w flames|strong="H3851"\w*.\f + \fr 13.8 \ft be amazed: Heb. wonder\f*\f + \fr 13.8 \ft one…: Heb. every man at his neighbour\f*\f + \fr 13.8 \ft flames: Heb. faces of the flames\f*

Behold, the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, \w cruel|strong="H0394"\w* both with \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* and \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, to \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*: and he shall \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* the \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* thereof out of it.

For the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w constellations|strong="H3685"\w* thereof shall not \w give|strong="H1984"\w* their \w light|strong="H0216"\w*: the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* shall be \w darkened|strong="H2821"\w* in his going \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* shall not cause her \w light|strong="H0216"\w* to \w shine|strong="H5050"\w*.

And I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* for \add their\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* for their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; and I will cause the \w arrogancy|strong="H1347"\w* of the \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*, and will lay \w low|strong="H8213"\w* the \w haughtiness|strong="H1346"\w* of the \w terrible|strong="H6184"\w*.

I will make a \w man|strong="H0582"\w* more \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* than fine \w gold|strong="H6337"\w*; even a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* than the golden \w wedge|strong="H3800"\w* of \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*.

Therefore I will \w shake|strong="H7264"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w remove|strong="H7493"\w* out of her \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, in the \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.

And it shall be as the \w chased|strong="H5080"\w* \w roe|strong="H6643"\w*, and as a \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* that no man taketh \w up|strong="H6908"\w*: they shall every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* to his own \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* into his own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Every one that is \w found|strong="H4672"\w* shall be thrust \w through|strong="H1856"\w*; and every one that is \w joined|strong="H5595"\w* \add unto them\add* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

Their \w children|strong="H5768"\w* also shall be dashed to \w pieces|strong="H7376"\w* before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*; their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* shall be \w spoiled|strong="H8155"\w*, and their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* \w ravished|strong="H7901"\w*.

Behold, I will stir \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w* against them, which shall not \w regard|strong="H2803"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; and \add as for\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, they shall not \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* in it.

\add Their\add* \w bows|strong="H7198"\w* also shall \w dash|strong="H7376"\w* the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* to \w pieces|strong="H7376"\w*; and they shall have no \w pity|strong="H7355"\w* on the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*; their \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall not \w spare|strong="H2347"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

¶ And \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, the \w glory|strong="H6643"\w* of \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*, the \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w* of the \w Chaldees’|strong="H3778"\w* \w excellency|strong="H1347"\w*, shall be as when \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w overthrew|strong="H4114"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* and \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*.\f + \fr 13.19 \ft as…: Heb. as the overthrowing\f*

It shall \w never|strong="H5331"\w* be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*, neither shall it be \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* in from \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*: neither shall the \w Arabian|strong="H6163"\w* pitch \w tent|strong="H0167"\w* there; neither shall the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* make their \w fold|strong="H7257"\w* there.

But wild beasts of the \w desert|strong="H6728"\w* shall \w lie|strong="H7257"\w* there; and their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* shall be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of doleful \w creatures|strong="H0255"\w*; and \w owls|strong="H1323"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* there, and \w satyrs|strong="H8163"\w* shall \w dance|strong="H7540"\w* there.\f + \fr 13.21 \ft wild…: Heb. Ziim\f*\f + \fr 13.21 \ft doleful…: Heb. Ochim\f*\f + \fr 13.21 \ft owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl\f*

And the wild beasts of the \w islands|strong="H0338"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H6030"\w* in their desolate \w houses|strong="H0490"\w*, and \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w* in \add their\add* \w pleasant|strong="H6027"\w* \w palaces|strong="H1964"\w*: and her \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and her \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall not be \w prolonged|strong="H4900"\w*.\f + \fr 13.22 \ft the wild…: Heb. Iim\f*\f + \fr 13.22 \ft desolate…: or, palaces\f*
